Text:
You need to know what Flash is before using this. You probably need to know a hell of a lot more also.

mProjector is a development tool that enables you to build full-blown applications with Flash-shaped interfaces ? unleashing the power of Macromedia速 Flash速 onto the desktop.

Could anyone please seed this? I waited a lot but don't see any. Please help
Please seed, I want to have this programm

I always pick up viruses with these DVT cracks. I have mprojector 3.1b - but don't know if I want to post it because it does get flagged by most AVs...

I really wish someone would just come out with a keygen instead of a crack. sadly not many people know what this is or how to use it. I'll tell you what, it's as simple to use as it is to use flash and you can make full applications with it. I did my first program with mprojector and flash and it looked awesome.
